coreAttributes.name: Heavy Bolter
coreAttributes.description: An Astartes Mark IV Heavy Bolter, is a very effective support weapon that only space marines can wield.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot at [npc2.name] with your heavy bolter.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the heavy bolter. For the Emperor!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] tens of bolter rounds at [npc2.name].
Opening fire, [npc2.name] is showered with bolter rounds, hissing as the propelled round pierces through the air!
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the bolter rounds collides with [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] tens of bolter rounds at [npc2.name], but end up missing.
Opening fire, [npc2.name] is showered with bolter rounds, hissing as the propelled round pierces through the air! The rounds hit what's behind [npc2.name] but none hit [npc2.herHim].
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the bolter rounds speed past [npc2.name]!
